explanation: The stage direction describes an object (the portrait of Monsieur Cassandre) and its placement on an easel in the back of the theater. This fits the definition of the 'object' category, which involves describing an object or a character's interaction with an object.
stgdir: Le Tableau qui représente le portrait de Monsieur Cassandre, est posé sur un chevalet dans le fond du Théâtre.
